title: Manchester United legend Eric Cantona on THAT kung-fu kick, why a Liverpool star is his favourite player and his fledgling acting career
text:
EFL The King Manchester United legend Eric Cantona on THAT kung-fu kick, why a Liverpool star is his favourite player and his fledgling acting career 
Charismatic Frenchman explains to Dave Kidd why he doesn't have a favourite goal and his thoughts on Zlatan Ibrahimovic Exclusive
